rules.description: Make 'd' a modal key to turn h/j/k/l into arrow keys when held.

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "⇪"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "⌫"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'
